args.name: name
args.doc: The name of the function.

items.name: argmode
items.doc: Argument mode: IN, OUT, INOUT, VARIADIC.

args.name: rettype
args.doc: The return data type of the function.

items.name: column_name
items.doc: The name of the output column.

items.name: column_type
items.doc: The data type of the output column.

args.name: lang_name
args.doc: The implementation language of the function.

args.name: transform
args.doc: Transforms a call to the function should apply

args.name: window
args.doc: Indicates if the function is a window function.

args.name: volatility
args.doc: The volatility of the function (IMMUTABLE, STABLE, VOLATILE).

args.name: leakproof
args.doc: Indicates if the function has side effects.

args.name: null_input_behavior
args.doc: Behavior for NULL inputs (CALLED ON NULL INPUT, RETURNS NULL ON NULL INPUT, STRICT).

args.name: security
args.doc: Priveleges to execute with (SECURITY INVOKER, SECURITY DEFINER).

args.name: parallel
args.doc: Parallel execution safety (UNSAFE, RESTRICTED, SAFE).

args.name: execution_cost
args.doc: The estimated execution cost of the function.

args.name: result_rows
args.doc: Estimated number of rows returned by the function.

args.name: support_function
args.doc: The name of the planner support function.

args.name: set_config

items.name: value
items.doc: The value for the configuration parameter.

args.doc: The name of the planner support function.

args.name: definition
args.doc: The function definition.

args.name: object_file
args.doc: The path to the object file for C functions.

args.name: link_symbol
args.doc: The name of the function in the C language source code

args.name: sql_body
args.doc: The SQL body of the function.

args.name: name
args.doc: The name of the user.

args.name: superuser
args.doc: Indicates if the user is a superuser.

args.name: createdb
args.doc: Indicates if the user can create databases.

args.name: createrole
args.doc: Indicates if the user can create other roles.

args.name: inherit
args.doc: Indicates if the user inherits privileges.

args.name: login
args.doc: Indicates if the user can log in.

args.name: replication
args.doc: Indicates if the user can connect in replication mode.

args.name: bypassrls
args.doc: Indicates if the role bypasses row-level security policies.

args.name: connection_limit
args.doc: The maximum number of concurrent connections for the role.

args.name: password
args.doc: The password for the user.

args.name: valid_until
args.doc: Expiration timestamp for the password.

args.name: membership

items.name: option
items.doc: Membership option: IN ROLE, ROLE, ADMIN.

args.doc: Defines role memberships and their options.

fields.name: userepl
fields.doc: User can initiate streaming replication and put the system in and out of backup mode

fields.name: usebypassrls
fields.doc: User bypasses every row-level security policy

fields.name: valuntil
fields.doc: Password expiry time (only used for password authentication)

fields.name: useconfig
fields.doc: Session defaults for run-time configuration variables
